Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Disruption
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Pulaski and Forest Park due to a medical emergency on the track. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between  Pulaski Congress and Forest Park due to a medical emergency on the tracks near Cicero Congress.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines while we work to provide alternatives.

This may include:
#7 Harrison
#8 Halsted
#60 Blue Island/26th
#126 Jackson
#49 Western
#53 Pulaski
#54 Cicero

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available from UIC Halsted to Forest Park to provide connecting  service in both directions.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for the latest service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: #34 South Michigan buses are temp rrtd in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford I-194 East, 130th, Eberhar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford I-194 East, 130th, Eberhart, over regular route, due to street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.
